column4: i know i can copy encrypted dvds for backup purposes of course, so i just thought maybe i can do the same thing with my games
x360 uses a unique file format.. google.
I think you can do that using compiz-config-settings-manager
where'd you find the skydome image option?
and you can put "gears" in there too!
you have to change the graphic.. worked for me in the past.
there's a setting in there where you can point to a graphic/photo you have.
not sure I haven't done it in a year
they have to be png or svg files.
